data.message:
Here's a rap for slim.

U mite be slim but homey im slicker
I will get a blade and trim ya beard while im busy sippin on some liquor
Throw up, now theres vomit my shirt already rom kendrick's spaghetti
Coz he could never cook, now my brand new t-shirt's all messy.
But ita oky,coz im from cape town, ya'll from compton
Its so dark in the streets, and my lyrics will make u take a wrong turn
Then u end up in detroit and met a guy with a beard
He's white and ya'll black, now he think that u think, he's face looks weird

Lol, haaaahaa!!!

replies.message:
Weak. Lamest shit I've heard in a grip.
#ItAintHatinIfItsTrue

You wacker than the motherfucker you bit your style from.
You couldn't sell two copies if you pressed a double album.

Sorry if u hate and debate on me privately
U try to spit on a rhythm,but do that shit quietly
Coz u to scared to let anyone hear the tone of ur voice
So why dont I just pull the plug on the mic, coz thats all thats make a noice
U get booed of the stage, now u cry like pussy kitten
U bow front of my feet, before I even start spitten
I dont need ur approval, go take ur rap paper and start shredding 
And note this shit down, coz it's unforgetting
nice one. Shermon Ivandre Icey Harmse i like the fact that you spit your rhyme on Eminem page. big up man keep em rolling. dont listen to this losers.
Word up Don. I dont care bout haters and loosers I just do my thing, coz rapping is my passion, and I won't even stop for a king!
nice dont let em derail you from your passion my guy. man please do me a favour can you please sent that Eminem pic to my indox so i can view it. if you don't mind
Wil do
Did u get it
let me check
inbox it to me. i haven't got it
So weak
Weak like ur arms lifting that bar,lmj,lol

I'm not a rapper at all, but I saw this post and wanted to see if I could bullshit a little. Shermon Ivandre Icey Harmse for shits and giggles.

I'm a therapist abusing your mind dog you can sue me
My rhyme's so sick you gag harder than when your girl blew me
My shit's poetic
I'll shit down your throat, you choke
We need an emergency medic
You're a grade school drop out
I'm a lyrical surgeon 
It's against my policy to operate on virgins
I can see the embarrassment 
You're wearing it
I cut so deep in your mind's hymen
You would swear I'm tearing it
This torture is too much for you to keep grinning and bearing it
I'm finna use the hatchet on your head
Then bury it
Get rid of the evidence, that's common sense
Defying my rhymes death is the only consequence 
You called me out like I'm an easy target
Guess you never got the memo:
homicide is my department
I'll chop you up and stuff you
Call it gross domestic product
Blow your brains across the wall
With a double barreled sawed off
A body without a head live on Instagram 
and you get hauled off
I split explosive cocktails
I breathe out fucking molotovs
I got you stuck like a neanderthal 
You're fucking frozen
Snapping both your legs in half
Like they was Derrick Rose's
I don't wanna keep this shit up
Cause I'm getting bored with you
Call me after the SAT
When you got more words to use
I didnt read it all, but its dope
It was longer than I meant. But I appreciate that.

U wanna be a docter but dont got the documentation to practice
Hide under homicide coz u actually on the suicidal act list
U posted a lot words but non om them ment nothing
I suggest u go back to ur pen, and tell him to come up with something
That chair that u sit in is wet, didn't u just sharted
My lyrics is on a jet already, urs is still waiting to be departed
Ur rhymes sounds retarded, I won't bother to play it over my stereo
So what types of worst cases do u have? Wait let me give u a scenario:
Reading my words will leave u cock eyed
I appreciate ur effort, atleast u tried.
My lyrics hide in ur brain, but u couldn't remember coz u suffer from Alzheimer's
Oky wait let me cut this rap, coz im tired of dissing old-timers 
Just know my thoughts are like moods and change by the weather
How long did it take for you to write that rhyme, wait let me guess..Forever?
That old timers line was dope. I like that.

This man's inspired by Em
This man's a fucking Stan
With clouds outside the windows
In love with a fucking man
How many downers did you take
To drive over this bridge? 
Murdering your girlfriend 
When she's pregnant with your kid
Bitch I'mma kill you
I'm a smart ass criminal
My lines are more than sublime
They're totally subliminal
I'm not an old timer
Respect the old heads
Elders eating you alive
Like the fucking Walking Dead
No one gets out alive when I put on this Jason mask
Rip you apart from behind got a chainsaw in your ass
If you don't like what I spit
Then you can suck my dick
Under the influence of rap while I'm raping your chick
So don't be a bitch and don't ever forget 
how it feels at rock bottom when you have to get slick just to survive
I'll burn you alive
I'm coming at five so get out of the house cause I'm coming with fire
I'm coming with five
Bitches in the room
Drink a cask of Amontillado while I'm sealing your tomb
My ceiling's so high 
that I'm never afraid
Now stop screaming bitch
And start digging your grave.
You just won everything. 👏👏👏👏
Well that was terrible.
Andre Blanco I don't even remotely think I'm a rapper. Lol. It was just something fun to do.

Shermon Ivandre Icey Harmse
You need to learn some proper English, your words don't make no sense
If your lyrics were worth any money, it'd only be a few cents
Cause the rhymes you be spittin, are lyrical disasters
You need to brush up on your skills, maybe listen to the true masters
I'm talking Slim, Snoop Dogg, Dr Dre and 2Pac
Listen to 'em a few times, write some better rhymes you might then become the Doc
The only reason the dude has Alzheimers, is to forget those wack assed lyrics
My rhymes leave you stunned, and screaming in hysterics
Let me finish with this flow, cause I know it's a lot to handle 
Your rhymes are so cold, they couldn't light a candle
Shermon Ivandre Icey Harmse no hate, it's just been forever since I've written lyrics and wanted to test my skills to see how well I do
No no no!!! Go to the laboratory and have ur lyrics tested plz man
was passing by then you all got my attention...its fun
